price: Uretse Ibilisi (Shitani) wanze kuba mu bubama.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
